properties.name: favicon.cacheFolder
properties.description: The folder where favicon files are cached.

properties.name: favicon.domainMapping
properties.description: Mapping of domains to direct favicon resource locations. Values can be a URL, a file path, or a classpath resource.

properties.name: favicon.urlTimeout
properties.description: The URL read timeout in milliseconds for fetching HTML pages.

properties.name: favicon.fallbackUrl
properties.description: The URL template for fallback favicon retrieval. Use {url} as placeholder for the site URL. Defaults to 'https://t3.gstatic.com/faviconV2?client=SOCIAL&type=FAVICON&fallback_opts=TYPE,SIZE,URL&url={url}&size=64'.
